edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Interface ScreenManager


  • public interface ScreenManager
    ScreenManager presents a set of related screens, such as playable levels. It allows us to manage all the different types of screens from the same code within Lol.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(int which)
      Display one of the screens

    • Method Detail

      • display

        void display(int which)
        Display one of the screens
        Parameters:
        which - The screen to display. Your code should use an /if/ statement to decide what screen to display based on the value of /which/
